thread.title: Bollywood celebs slam scrapping of Ghulam Ali's Mumbai concert
thread.title_full: Bollywood celebs slam scrapping of Ghulam Ali's Mumbai concert - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Bollywood celebs slam scrapping of Ghulam Ali's Mumbai concert
text:
Veteran actress Shabana Azmi, music composers Vishal Dadlani and Shekhar Ravjiani have criticised the cancellation of Pakistan i singer Ghulam Ali 's concert here following Shiv Sena 's threat to disrupt it.*Shekhar Ravjiani and Vishal Dadlani*
The 74-year-old singer was scheduled to perform tomorrow but Shiv Sena warned that no ... Â»
